name: Amazon EC2 P3 Instance
short: A high-performance computing service on AWS that provides powerful graphics processing units (GPUs) for machine learning and graphics-intensive applications.
description: Amazon EC2 P3 Instances are powerful, scalable virtual servers for machine learning, high performance computing, data analytics, and other GPU-intensive applications. They leverage NVIDIA Tesla V100 GPUs, offering up to 1 petaflop of mixed-precision performance. They support AWS services like Elastic Block Store (EBS), Elastic Load Balancing (ELB), and Amazon Machine Images (AMIs). With on-demand or reserved pricing options, users can optimize costs while achieving superior computational performance.
